items.title: Supreme Student Council
items.blurb: The Supreme Student Council is the highest governing body of student organizations, fostering leadership and promoting unity across campus.

items.title: Cattleya Residence Hall
items.blurb: Safe, comfortable housing with a supportive environment for academics and community life.

items.title: University Hospital
items.blurb: Patient care, medical services, and public health programs for the CMU community.

items.title: University Registrar
items.blurb: Manages records, registration, and academic services for students.

items.title: Library Services
items.blurb: Collections, databases, and study spaces supporting learning and research.

items.title: Office of Student Affairs and Services (OSAS)
items.blurb: Student support, counseling, activities, and welfare programs.
